author: fuzzylogic
msg: DERBY-1045: Remove Class-Path attribute from derbytools.jar manifest.
Autoloading of the JDBC drivers causes problems in a mixed-jar environment,
because the load from the tools Class-Path will take precedence over a client
that appears later in the classpath.

author: cutting
msg: Merge -r 379518:381427 from trunk to 1.9 branch prior to release.

author: danielf
msg: No need to use a snapshot anymore. This removes the need to connect to the repository each time the project is rebuilt.

author: tellison
msg: Fix for HARMONY-134 (uninitialised variables in "goto bail" code path in linux native launcher/main.c)
